search_results.title: scoles / jarchive scraper | ScraperWiki

question: (Sarah of the Clue Crew demonstrates.)  The flame appears to be underwater, but actually the water is cooling the candle's outer layer, preventing the wax from burning, because it can't do this, from the Latin for "to disperse to vapor"
